library(pacman)
pacman::p_load(tidyverse)

ts_df <- read.csv(file = "data/ts_data.csv", header = TRUE) %>% 
  mutate(Year = as.Date(Year, format = "%Y-%m-%d")) %>%
      dplyr::filter(Year >= as.Date("1985-01-01"), Year <= as.Date("2010-01-01"), Country=="France") %>% arrange(Year)
